title: Hot Spots
description: A list of popular destinations within the city to visit

items.description: Details of a single location that users can visit to eat, explore, or entertain

on_campus.description: If true, then the destination is on the university's campus. Otherwise, the destination is near or within the city, generally close to the university

hours.description: Daily hours of operation for the destination, where the 0th element is monday, and the 6th is sunday

items.description: Opening and closing hours for a particular day

is_open.description: If true, then the destination is open this day, or closed otherwise

opens.description: Time that the destination opens on this day

closes.description: Time that the destination closes on this day

rating.description: Rating from 1-5 stars, from a trusted rating aggregation source

cost.description: Cost rating from 0-5, where 0 is free, 5 is expensive, from a trusted rating aggregation source

description.description: Description of the destination and the goods/services it provides

last_updated.description: Milliseconds since the epoch of the time the data was last updated

category.description: Category of good or service that the destination provides

external_links.description: A set of external web links the user may find useful regarding the desstination

source.description: Source of the information about the destination. Not included if the data was not retrieved from another source

name.description: Identifier for the source of the information

url.description: URL that can be visited from which the information was retrieved

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the destination. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages

^link(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the destination. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages
